statements: SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM medical_records LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM medical_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE medical_history->>'symptom' = 'Fever' AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE risk_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM health_information WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE risk_level > 3;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, risk_level FROM medical_records ORDER BY risk_level DESC;
SELECT m.patient_name, h.blood_pressure, h.heart_rate FROM medical_records m JOIN health_information h ON m.record_id = h.record_id WHERE h.heart_rate > 80;
SELECT MAX(weight), MIN(weight), AVG(heart_rate) FROM health_information;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE health_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY record_date ASC
SELECT assessment_date, risk_level FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension'

SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN risk_assessment ON medical_records.record_id = risk_assessment.record_id WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE treatment LIKE '%Medication%' AND record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY record_date ASC

SELECT patient_name, health_condition, risk_level FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN risk_assessment ON medical_records.record_id = risk_assessment.record_id WHERE risk_level IN ('High', 'Medium')
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT treatment_name, description FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE blood_type='O+';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, reason_for_visit FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT test_name, result, date_conducted FROM lab_results WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY date_conducted DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, appointment_date FROM patients INNER JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM lab_results ORDER BY date_conducted DESC;
